resources.string: With Watchdog for Sphero, you can position your Android device for surveillance of an area of your home, and whenever the camera detects any motion in that area, Sphero will roll towards the intruder with a challenge. Good fun for pets, friends, and family members, but don\'t rely on it to protect the family jewels :)
Position your Android device on its side in a stable location, in landscape orientation.
Position camera so that crosshairs are centered on area to be monitored, wake up your paired Sphero and place it in the center, then press Connect

Camera motion was detected, causing surveillance to end. Each time your Android device moves, the new camera position must be recalibrated. If you think this is being triggered in error, disable motion detection from the preferences menu.

The magenta light from Sphero could not be located. Try an environment without direct sunlight, and adjust the camera white balance using the preferences menu if necessary. Also, remove any objects with colors close to magenta from the scene. Then try setup again.
Sphero is no longer visible to your camera, and attempts to move it back into view did not help. Please perform setup again.
1. Position your Android device\'s camera to monitor an area. If you don\'t have a phone holder, maybe you can build one out of plastic bricks?
2. Activate your paired Sphero in the middle of the area being monitored and then start the automatic setup procedure.
3. Sit back and watch what happens when intruders enter! Don\'t forget to capture some video footage and submit it to our website :)
Announce all watchdog activity out loud (using your Android device\'s current text-to-speech preferences).
